sentences.en: Bonfires ward off the morning chill at a Roma encampment south of the French capital, Paris.
sentences.cn: 篝火抵御清晨的寒气,在法国首都巴黎南部的罗马露营.

sentences.en: Cairne Bloodhoof: If the prophet was correct, then the Warsong encampment lies just over the ridge.
sentences.cn: 凯恩?血蹄: 如果先知所说没错的话, 战歌部落就在对面.

sentences.en: Field Mouse persuaded him to fire into the air as he sneaked out of the encampment.
sentences.cn: 地老鼠嘱咐他等自己溜出营房后,对空鸣枪.

sentences.en: Footman: Murlocs? Here? They must have an encampment nearby!
sentences.cn: 步兵: 莫洛克? (鱼人种族)竟然在这儿? 附近一定有它们的营地!

sentences.en: I fear that these creatures are massing for an attack against our encampment.
sentences.cn: 我担心这些怪物会群聚在一起攻击我们的营地.

sentences.en: If they have just eaten and not yet established their encampment, be attacked.
sentences.cn: 刚用完餐,尚未整顿进入备战状态, 可以攻击.

sentences.en: Our vigilance was stimulated by our finding traces of a large encampment?
sentences.cn: 我们发现了一次大规模的驻营痕迹,这促使我们提高警觉.

sentences.en: Some buring firebrands brightened the whole encampment like the daytime.
sentences.cn: 一些燃着的火把让整个营地像白天一样明亮.

sentences.en: The encampment will be established in Peking and Kunming respectively.
sentences.cn: 二,营地分别设在北京与昆明.

sentences.en: The grind that the encampment has occupied is covered with remnant and fragment of all kinds.
sentences.cn: 营地所在地被各种各样的残骸碎物覆盖著.

sentences.en: Their encampment was in the mountains.

trans.tran_en: a large temporary camp, especially of soldiers
